name: Brickcore
short_description:
Brickcore is a "missile defense" style arcade game with elements similar to "breakout". The game is written in Python and Pygame. The goal is to prevent the oncoming balls from destroying the core, which is protected by revolving bricks.
Now available is an Android port written in Java, still in development.
